Ideas for improvement: // note 1: - code more compliant with developer guidelines // note 1: - for implementing PHP constant arguments look at // note 1: the pathinfo() function, it offers the greatest // note 1: flexibility & compatibility possible // example 1: round(1241757, -3) // returns 1: 1242000 // example 2: round(3.6) // returns 2: 4 // example 3: round(2.835, 2) // returns 3: 2.84 // example 4: round(1.1749999999999, 2) // returns 4: 1.17 // example 5: round(58551.799999999996, 2) // returns 5: 58551.8 var m, f, isHalf, sgn // helper variables // making sure precision is integer precision |= 0 m = Math.pow(10, precision) value *= m // sign of the number sgn = (value > 0) | -(value < 0) isHalf = value % 1 === 0.5 * sgn f = Math.floor(value) if (isHalf) { switch (mode) { case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_DOWN': // rounds .5 toward zero value = f + (sgn < 0) break case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_EVEN': // rouds .5 towards the next even integer value = f + (f % 2 * sgn) break case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_ODD': // rounds .5 towards the next odd integer value = f + !(f % 2) break default: // rounds .5 away from zero value = f + (sgn > 0) } } return (isHalf ? value : Math.round(value)) / m } {% endcodeblock %}
